summary: **American Horror Story** is a TV series with different scary stories in each season. Created by Ryan Murphy and Brad Falchuk, it airs on FX. Many actors, like Evan Peters and Sarah Paulson, return as new characters. Each season has a different setting, such as a haunted house, a mental institution, or a freak show. The show has been popular and won many awards, especially for its actors like Jessica Lange and Lady Gaga. FX has renewed it through season 13.
title: American Horror Story
